title: The World According to Bertie
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: "I haven't mentioned the most secretive one of all. That's a strictly women's club called the Ravelston Dykes. They meet every other week in Ravelston.

title: Reheated Cabbage
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: — Not at all, my dear, not at all, Ormiston smiled. Hewatched her depart, and his face sank into a frown as hecontemplated the mind-numbing tedium of a family Sundayafternoon at Ravelston Dykes. — Bugger it, he hissed softly,then went to the toilet to clean himself up.
